So your LEAVING the Darius heal as it is? Hooooooly.... Wake up Riot O.O How out of everything that you did to him this patch, you renamed his passive over removing, or at least nerfing, the heal from his Q.

They actually buffed him with a hotfix, increased damage and heal on decimate:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-516-notes#patch-patch-updates

I think I remember that, I think the increased Decimate damage was okay, but buffing the heal was not. I don't see how buffing Darius from a 'not picked often' champ to a 'you can't f*cking kill me' champ, is balanced. Only way you stop Darius from doing stuff in teamfights is if you dominate him early, and even that is a pain in the ass
